data.comment: The match is underway in Blackburn.
Shaun Williams is booked for the away team.
In the minute 25, Harvey Elliott scores to make it 1-0 at Ewood Park.
Goal! Scott Malone equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Blackburn - Millwall with the kick-off.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a first substitution, with Tyrhys Dolan replacing Ben Brereton.
Millwall's Murray Wallace has been booked in Blackburn.
In the minute 74, Blackburn make their second substitution with Stewart Downing replacing Sam Gallagher.
Joe Rothwell is on a sub for Lewis Holtby for Blackburn.
John Buckley is replacing Harvey Elliott for Blackburn at Ewood Park.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson with Ben Thompson.
The away team have replaced Troy Parrott with Tom Bradshaw. This is the second substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
Gary Rowett is making the team's third substitution at Ewood Park with Ryan Leonard replacing Shaun Williams.
Adam Armstrong is on target to give Blackburn a 2-1 advantage.
Matt Smith is replacing Ryan Woods for Millwall at Ewood Park.
Jiri Skalak is replacing Mahlon Romeo for the away team.
Tony Mowbray is making the team's fifth substitution at Ewood Park with Tom Trybull replacing Adam Armstrong.
